### Example 1: Add a single VirtualNetworkRule to NetworkRuleSet for the given Namespace (autogenerated)
```powershell
PS C:\> Add-AzEventHubVirtualNetworkRule -Name Eventhub-Namespace1-2389 -ResourceGroupName v-ajnavtest -SubnetId /subscriptions/SubscriptionId/resourcegroups/ResourceGroup/v-ajnavtest/providers/Microsoft.Network/virtualNetworks/sbehvnettest1/subnets/sbdefault01
```
